The story follows Mia as she navigates through the challenges of being royalty, including dealing with jealous and powerful family members.
rec_titles: The Man Who Knew Too Little

conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: What kind of story does The Princess Diaries tell? Hmm, I didn’t expect that vibe.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I recommend watching "Saw". This movie tells the story of a young woman who is kidnapped and put on trial by a group of masked individuals known as "The Others". The young woman must use her wit and courage to outsmart her captors and ultimately escape their grasp.
Starring Shawnee Smith, Michael Emerson, Monica Potter.

conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: Could we switch to something else by John Whitesell? That feels deeper than I thought. (I’m thinking of Saw.)

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Wild, Surrogates, Bangkok Dangerous, and She's All That are all great recommendations! I hope you enjoy watching them! If you're looking for something different, you might want to check out some of the lesser-known movies on this list. They might be just as enjoyable to watch!
